data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in Genoa.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Goran Pandev for Genoa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Federico La Penna signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Genoa's half.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
In the minute 10, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Genoa.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Throw-in Genoa.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria's Tommaso Augello misses with an attempt on goal.
Federico La Penna awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Gaston Ramirez, who is grimacing with pain.
Gaston Ramirez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 17, Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Sampdoria's area.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Edoardo Goldaniga (Genoa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 20, Genoa advance rapidly upfield but Federico La Penna blows for offside.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Gaston Ramirez of Sampdoria gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, Genoa have a goal kick.
Federico La Penna signals a Genoa throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
Jakub Jankto scores to make it 1-0 at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 23, Albin Ekdal with an assist there.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 26, Important block from the Sampdoria defence as Nicolo Rovella fires in a strike for Genoa.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Corner awarded to Genoa.
In the minute 27, Genoa push upfield and Cristian Zapata gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sampdoria defence.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Gianluca Scamacca.
In the minute 28, That's a fine assist from Lukas Lerager.
Free kick Genoa.
Morten Thorsby is booked for the home team.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 37, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 38, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Albin Ekdal (Sampdoria) has received a yellow card from Federico La Penna.
Genoa's Nicolo Rovella breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Genoa drive upfield and Goran Pandev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 40, Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Genoa have an attacking throw-in.
Genoa have a dangerous throw-in.
Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Sampdoria's area.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Genoa Genoa's Goran Pandev is caught offside.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Genoa in the half of Sampdoria.
Gianluca Scamacca for the away team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 49, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Genoa Genoa drive forward through Goran Pandev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Throw-in Genoa.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Genoa.
Throw-in Genoa.
Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Lukas Lerager (Genoa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 65, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Albin Ekdal for Sampdoria who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Keita Balde is on a sub for Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Gaston Ramirez with Valerio Verre.
It seems as if Albin Ekdal is unable to continue. Adrien Silva replaces him for the home team.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
In the minute 67, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Federico La Penna awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Genoa's half?
Sampdoria are on the attack at Luigi Ferraris, where Keita Balde is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 71, Sampdoria are coming forward and Mikkel Damsgaard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Marko Pjaca is replacing Gianluca Scamacca for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Valon Behrami is replacing Milan Badelj for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Sampdoria make their fourth substitution with Antonio Candreva replacing Mikkel Damsgaard.
Federico La Penna blows against Sampdoria's Keita Balde for offside.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Domenico Criscito with Luca Pellegrini. This is the third substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 78, Sampdoria's Keita Balde is on target but unsuccessful.
Marko Pjaca for Genoa is whistled offside.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria are pushing forward but Antonio Candreva's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Genoa at Luigi Ferraris.
Genoa drives forward and Marko Pjaca gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sampdoria make their fifth substitution with Mehdi Leris replacing Jakub Jankto.
In the minute 86, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Bartosz Bereszynski (Sampdoria) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a fourth substitution, with Ivan Radovanovic replacing Lukas Lerager.
In the minute 86, Filippo Melegoni is replacing Miha Zajc for the away team.
Keita Balde of Sampdoria is pulled up for offside.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 88, In Genoa Sampdoria attack through Antonio Candreva. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Genoa's Ivan Radovanovic breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Federico La Penna awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Federico La Penna will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Federico La Penna blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
